page.title: 10Recreation -Todwick.
page.content: In Todwick there are two{playing {fields,}called the 'rec and the park. The grounds can be used by adults for football and cricket and for children there are swings, a slide, a roundabout, and a B.M.X track for bicycle riding. People go to clubs like Teenyboppers, which is for younger children, and for teenagers there is the{Youth Club.}Gardening, or tending an allotment, is mostly for older people who enjoy it because it relaxes them. Taking a dog for a walk in a field or somewhere like that is relaxing. Children might go cycling on the B.M.X course and adults might ride cycles for sport. We also have horseriding stables. Adults might go to a pub or restaurant for a meal or drink. There are cinemas,theatres and sports facilities in nearby towns.
